span.span: The April/May newsletter (Volume 15, 4th Quarter), The Parental & Family Engagement CONNECTION, is available in English, Spanish, German, Korean, and Vietnamese. https://www.esc16.net/page/title1swi.3_newsletter%20-%20Copy

This edition of the newsletter includes articles about TX Dept of Agriculture Summer Meal Program, College Checklist and PELL Grants, Summer Activities for Kids, Summer Safety, and Preventing Summer Learning Loss.

div.p: Shamrock ISD is committed to supporting the needs of our community as well as others who visit our website. We are proud to announce that our website is ADA Compliant; however, if users come across a document, image, or other item on our website that is not accessible, please contact Laramie Jernigan, Technology Coordinator for assistance. Posted January 3, 2018.
